data.name: UnoControlScrollBarModel
desc: specifies the standard model of a UnoControlScrollBar.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: BackgroundColor
desc: specifies the RGB color to be used for the control.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: BlockIncrement
desc: specifies the increment for a block move.

properties.name: Border
desc: specifies the border style of the control.

properties.name: BorderColor
desc: specifies the color of the border, if present
Not every border style (see Border) may support coloring. For instance, usually a border with 3D effect will ignore the BorderColor setting.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: Enabled
desc: determines whether the control is enabled or disabled.

properties.name: HelpText
desc: specifies the help text of the control.

properties.name: HelpURL
desc: specifies the help URL of the control.

properties.name: LineIncrement
desc: specifies the increment for a single line move.

properties.name: LiveScroll
desc: specifies the scrolling behavior of the control.

TRUE means, that when the user moves the slider in the scroll bar, the content of the window is updated immediately. FALSE means, that the window is only updated after the user has released the mouse button.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: Orientation
desc: specifies the ScrollBarOrientation of the control.

properties.name: Printable
desc: specifies that the control will be printed with the document.

properties.name: RepeatDelay
desc: specifies the mouse repeat delay, in milliseconds.

When the user presses a mouse in a control area where this triggers an action (such as scrolling the scrollbar), then usual control implementations allow to repeatedly trigger this action, without the need to release the mouse button and to press it again. The delay between two such triggers is specified with this property.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: ScrollValue
desc: specifies the scroll value of the control.

properties.name: ScrollValueMax
desc: specifies the maximum scroll value of the control.

properties.name: ScrollValueMin
desc: specifies the minimum scroll value of the control.
If this optional property is not present, clients of the component should assume a minimal scroll value of 0.

properties.name: SymbolColor
desc: specifies the RGB color to be used when painting symbols which are part of the control's appearance, such as the arrow buttons.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: Tabstop
desc: specifies that the control can be reached with the TAB key.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: VisibleSize
desc: specifies the visible size of the scroll bar.
